name: Cell Hunter
description:
Cell hunter is a twin stick shooter with procedurally generated levels. Inspired by Plague.inc, player will control a virus that mutate and infect other bodies. With satisfying shooting and bullet dodging, you are challenged to defeat increasingly dangerous cells and evolve into the ultimate cell hunter.

Controls:

WASD / Left Stick -  Move

Left Mouse / Right Trigger - Shoot

Right Mouse / Left Trigger - Multiply

Space / Select - Mutate
